title: Milkyway
synopsis: Based on the hentai PC game of the same name by Witch. A series about a man who owns a cafe called "Milkyway" and the group of young women who help him tend it.
staff: [['UNDER17', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Kuroda, Yousuke', ['Screenplay']], ['Kurata, Hideyuki', ['Screenplay']], ['Senomoto, Hisashi', ['Original Character Design']]]
